text: I, zavershiv blagochestivyye obryady, Slav'te Allakha tak zhe, Kak vy prezhde slavili ottsov, No s yeshche bol'shim rveniyem i siloy. Sredi lyudey takiye yest', kto govorit: "Vladyka nash! Daruy nam Svoyu shchedrost' v etom mire!" - No ni yedinoy doli blagodati Im v zhizni budushchey ne obresti
